nodes.text: Rimcee system was a star system in the Braxant sector of the Outer Rim.

It was located in the Imperial space towards the end of the Galactic Civil War. It contained an Imperial Military base called Rimcee Station which, in 19 ABY, was used to imprison Colonel Meizh Vermel, who was held as a political prisoner by Moff Disra during his bid against Fleet Admiral Pellaeon's peace proposal in hopes of inciting civil war within the New Republic over the Caamas Document.
